Module ZiqiYang
Package org.ziqi.gameEngine.manager

Class MusicManager

java.lang.Object
org.ziqi.gameEngine.manager.GameManager
org.ziqi.gameEngine.manager.MusicManager
public class MusicManager
extends GameManager
MusicManager class as game manager to take charge of loading, arranging levels and sets of levels for user to choose and play.
This class apply an observer pattern as subject with all observer manually attached/register by itself to reduce unnecessary new classes.
When one MediaPlayer is playing or trying to stop, this class informs to all its attached MediaPlayers to update their status, either stop or continue to play.
Author:
Ziqi Yang
See Also:
GameManager, MediaPlayer

    • MusicManager

      public MusicManager()

  • Method Details

    • getMusicNames

      public static java.lang.String[] getMusicNames()
      Gets the array of strings specifying file names from resource.
      This method will be called to help resource manager loading media source when engine launched.
      Returns:
      An array of strings specifying file names from resource is returned to caller.
      See Also:
      ResourceManager.loadMediaFromResource(HashMap)

    • attachMediaPlayers

      public void attachMediaPlayers()
      Attaches, with the help of ResourceManager, all media sources to mediaPlayer observers for musicManager to update.
      This method will be called just after the GameEngine is launched.
      See Also:
      ResourceManager

    • playBGM

      public void playBGM()
      Plays background music for start screen and informs all other media players.
      This observer pattern update method for m_BackgroundMusic.
      See Also:
      m_BackgroundMusic, notifyOtherMediaPlayer()

    • playGamingMusic

      public void playGamingMusic()
      Plays gaming music for gaming screen and informs all other media players.
      This observer pattern update method for m_GamingMusic.
      See Also:
      m_GamingMusic, notifyOtherMediaPlayer()

    • playCompletionMusic

      public void playCompletionMusic()
      Plays completion music when a level completed and informs all other media players.
      This observer pattern update method for m_CompletionMusic.
      See Also:
      m_CompletionMusic, notifyOtherMediaPlayer()

    • notifyOtherMediaPlayer

      private void notifyOtherMediaPlayer()
      Notifies and handles all attached mediaPlayers when one music is playing.
      This ensure all background version music will stop to let another to play, while the one-time sound effect won't be affected.
      See Also:
      m_BackgroundMusic, m_GamingMusic, m_CompletionMusic, m_VictoryScreenMusic, m_ScoreboardMusic, m_SetChoosingMusic
